content: Revenues from apparel increased 44% year-over-year to $109 million, lifting to our overall gross margin to 55% compared with 47% a year ago. In the second quarter, our total revenue was $132 million, up 8% year-over-year from $122 million. Revenues from apparels increased by 44% to $109 million, representing 82% of total revenue compared with 62% in the same quarter of 2021. Total fulfillment and G&A expenses remained stable at $17 million as a percentage of total revenue both decreased to 13% from 14% a year ago, even though our total revenue grew by 8% in the same period.
